original_title: Bring Me the Head of Lance Henriksen
overview: When '80s B-movie icon Tim Thomerson wakes up one day to realize the acting roles are not coming his way any more, he sets out on a quest to find his former co-star Lance Henriksen to discover his secret of Hollywood longevity and gets more than he bargained for in the process.
title: Bring Me the Head of Lance Henriksen
